channel.title: Mouse on jar
channel.description:
Whenever I make a jar the mouse offsets just a little(like 1-3 spaces off).
-The regular client works though -The webclient works though
Any ideas as to what could cause this?

item.title: Mouse on jar
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

if(gameFrame != null) { i -= 4;//4 j -= 22;//22 }
Used to offset the mouse by the window frame borders. Chances are you changed how the client draws in the frame but didn’t update it for this.

Read full topic

item.title: Mouse on jar
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:2, topic:518557”]Can you elaborate more in depth? Are you saying that in-game, the mouse isn’t calibrated correctly?[/quote]that is exactly what I am saying.

Not sure if it’s the frame itself or the mouse pointer.

Edit: almost positive it’s in rsapplet class somewhere…

http://pastebin.com/t6Bfr3BC

Edit #2: just used Winmerge with another client I possess and I ddin’t see anything different besides the width is 34 in the other one and the one I am using is 33. Will change to 34 and see if there are any improvements.

[hr]

Fixed I think…will post later if not

Read full topic
